itunes:title: My Journey to Publication - Julia Claiborne Johnson
title: My Journey to Publication - Julia Claiborne Johnson
description: In this hilarious episode, author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with Julia Claiborne Johnson, bestselling author of Better Luck Next Time and Be Frank with Me,  about becoming a debut novelist in her 50s, her journey to publication, the challenges she faced with her second novel, juggling writing with being a mother, managing expectations, and the advice she'd like to share with emerging writers.
content:encoded: In this hilarious episode, author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with Julia Claiborne Johnson, bestselling author of Better Luck Next Time and Be Frank with Me,  about becoming a debut novelist in her 50s, her journey to publication, the challenges she faced with her second novel, juggling writing with being a mother, managing expectations, and the advice she'd like to share with emerging writers.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and Julia Claiborne Johnson
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Julia Claiborne Johnson, writing advice, debut novelist; second novel, journey to publication, publishing
